assignments.name: Okay_to_be_sent_to_website
assignments.label: Okay to be sent to website

decisions.name: At_least_one_record_must_be_Client_Req
decisions.label: At least one record must be Client Req

formulas.name: Budgetcurrency
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!FieldOutPut}, "\"Budget_currency__c\":\""), MID( {!FieldOutPut}, FIND("\"Budget_currency__c\":\"", {!FieldOutPut}) + LEN("\"Budget_currency__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!FieldOutPut}, FIND("\"Budget_currency__c\":\"", {!FieldOutPut}) + LEN("\"Budget_currency__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"Budget_currency__c\":\"", {!FieldOutPut}) + LEN("\"Budget_currency__c\":\"") ) ), "" )

formulas.name: Budgetmax
formulas.expression: VALUE( MID( {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"Budget_max__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Budget_max__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"Budget_max__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Budget_max__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"Budget_max__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Budget_max__c\":\"") ) ) )

formulas.name: BudgetMin
formulas.expression: VALUE( MID( {!FieldOutPut}, FIND("\"Budget_min__c\":\"", {!FieldOutPut}) + LEN("\"Budget_min__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!FieldOutPut}, FIND("\"Budget_min__c\":\"", {!FieldOutPut}) + LEN("\"Budget_min__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"Budget_min__c\":\"", {!FieldOutPut}) + LEN("\"Budget_min__c\":\"") ) ) )

formulas.name: Cabinsmin
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!ReqAddValues}, "\"Cabins_min__c\":\""), MID( {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"Cabins_min__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Cabins_min__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"Cabins_min__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Cabins_min__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"Cabins_min__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Cabins_min__c\":\"") ) ), "" )

formulas.name: currencyBudget
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!ReqEditValue}, "\"Budget_currency__c\":\""), MID( {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"Budget_currency__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Budget_currency__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"Budget_currency__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Budget_currency__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"Budget_currency__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Budget_currency__c\":\"") ) ), "" )

formulas.name: DescriptionValue
EditReqTrueClick
formulas.expression: {!Requirement_EditDel_Btn.outputValue} ="Edit"

formulas.name: LOAMaxMetres
formulas.expression: VALUE( MID( {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\"") ) ) )

formulas.name: LOAMinMetres
formulas.expression: VALUE( MID( {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\"") ) ) )

formulas.name: MaxBudget
formulas.expression: VALUE( MID( {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"Budget_max__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Budget_max__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"Budget_max__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Budget_max__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"Budget_max__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Budget_max__c\":\"") ) ) )

formulas.name: MaxMetreLOA
formulas.expression: VALUE( MID( {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"LOA_max_metres__c\":\"") ) ) )

formulas.name: MinBudget
formulas.expression: VALUE( MID( {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"Budget_min__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Budget_min__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"Budget_min__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Budget_min__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"Budget_min__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Budget_min__c\":\"") ) ) )

formulas.name: MinCabin
MinMetresLOA
formulas.expression: VALUE( MID( {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"LOA_min_metres__c\":\"") ) ) )

formulas.name: NameReq
RequirementType
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!ReqAddValues}, "\"Requirement_Type__c\":\""), MID( {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"Requirement_Type__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Requirement_Type__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"Requirement_Type__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Requirement_Type__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"Requirement_Type__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Requirement_Type__c\":\"") ) ), "" )

formulas.name: TrueCondtionAddreqClick
formulas.expression: {!Requirement_ADD_Button.outputValue} = "Add"

formulas.name: TrueDel
formulas.expression: {!Requirement_EditDel_Btn.outputValue} = "Delete"

formulas.name: TypeReq
TypeYacht
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!ReqEditValue}, "\"Yacht_type__c\":\""), MID( {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"Yacht_type__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Yacht_type__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqEditValue}, FIND("\"Yacht_type__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Yacht_type__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"Yacht_type__c\":\"", {!ReqEditValue}) + LEN("\"Yacht_type__c\":\"") ) ), "" )

formulas.name: Yachttype
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!ReqAddValues}, "\"Yacht_type__c\":\""), MID( {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"Yacht_type__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Yacht_type__c\":\""), FIND( "\"", {!ReqAddValues}, FIND("\"Yacht_type__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Yacht_type__c\":\"") ) - ( FIND("\"Yacht_type__c\":\"", {!ReqAddValues}) + LEN("\"Yacht_type__c\":\"") ) ), "" )

fields.name: WarningMessageBasket
fields.fieldText: Warning : The yacht '{!YachtAlreadyCreatedBasketOrNot.Results.YachtsName}' is already linked to another basket. Please deselect it before proceeding."

value.stringValue: padding:12px; background:#f9fcff; display:flex; flex-wrap:wrap; gap:10px; justify-content:flex-end; border:1px solid #eef5fb; border-radius:10px; box-shadow:0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.04);
